body_html:
Right now you have to build install pytorch for that header to be installed correctly. There's three options:

  1. Merge #5772 which fixes this and looks ready anyway,
  2. python setup.py build install
  3. python run_test.py --exclude cpp_extensions

(1) is probably best
body_text:
Right now you have to build install pytorch for that header to be installed correctly. There's three options:

Merge #5772 which fixes this and looks ready anyway,
python setup.py build install
python run_test.py --exclude cpp_extensions

(1) is probably best
body:
Right now you have to `build install` pytorch for that header to be installed correctly. There's three options:
1. Merge https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/5772 which fixes this and looks ready anyway,
2. `python setup.py build install`
3. `python run_test.py --exclude cpp_extensions`

(1) is probably best
